unnormalised: **Follower Analytics: Are Your Insta Fans Genuine, Yaar?**
normalised: **Follower Analytics: Are Your Insta Fans Genuine, Yaar?**

unnormalised: Mumbai: Feeling like your Instagram engagement's gone colder than Delhi in December? Time to dig into follower analytics! Experts at IIM-Ahmedabad are saying understanding *who's* following you is more crucial than just seeing the numbers.
normalised: Mumbai: Feeling like your Instagram engagement's gone colder than Delhi in December? Time to dig into follower analytics! Experts at I I M-Ahmedabad are saying understanding *who's* following you is more crucial than just seeing the numbers.

unnormalised: Forget vanity metrics, folks! We're talking identifying fake accounts and ghost followers. Think about it - are those "Rs. 500 off" profiles REALLY boosting your brand, or just padding your ego?
normalised: Forget vanity metrics, folks! We're talking identifying fake accounts and ghost followers. Think about it - are those "rupee five hundred off" profiles REALLY boosting your brand, or just padding your ego?

unnormalised: New apps popping up let you analyse follower demographics, engagement rates, and even identify bots lurking in your follower list. Dr. Sharma, a digital marketing guru from IIT-Bombay, suggests regularly auditing your followers to ensure genuine engagement.
normalised: New apps popping up let you analyse follower demographics, engagement rates, and even identify bots lurking in your follower list. Doctor Sharma, a digital marketing guru from I I T-Bombay, suggests regularly auditing your followers to ensure genuine engagement.

unnormalised: He says, "A smaller, highly engaged audience of 5000 is better than 50,000 bots and inactive profiles." Think quality, not quantity!
normalised: He says, "A smaller, highly engaged audience of five thousand is better than fifty thousand bots and inactive profiles." Think quality, not quantity!

unnormalised: Plus, weeding out fakes helps improve your ad targeting, ensuring your message reaches REAL potential customers. Imagine wasting ad spend targeting bots from, say, rural Bihar when you're selling designer sarees in a 2000 sq ft Bandra boutique! Get analyzing, and make your social media work smarter, not harder. It's all about 'atma-nirbhar' influencer marketing!
normalised: Plus, weeding out fakes helps improve your ad targeting, ensuring your message reaches REAL potential customers. Imagine wasting ad spend targeting bots from, say, rural Bihar when you're selling designer sarees in a two thousand square feet Bandra boutique! Get analyzing, and make your social media work smarter, not harder. It's all about 'atma-nirbhar' influencer marketing!
